article.title: Miller Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition, Technology and Logistics

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text:
Mary J. Miller has been assigned as the principal deputy assistant secretary of defense for research and engineering, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition, Technology and Logistics, Washington, D.C.
Â
